verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the second <WH8145> year <WH8141> after they were come out <WH3318> of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> saying, <WH559>
Let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> also keep <WH6213> <WH853> the passover <WH6453> at his appointed season. <WH4150>

In the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of this <WH2088> month, <WH2320> at <WH996> even, <WH6153> ye shall keep <WH6213> it in his appointed season: <WH4150> according to all <WH3605> the rites <WH2708> of it, and according to all <WH3605> the ceremonies <WH4941> thereof, shall ye keep <WH6213> it.
And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they should keep <WH6213> the passover. <WH6453>

And they kept <WH6213> <WH853> the passover <WH6453> on the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> at <WH996> even <WH6153> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai: <WH5514> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses, <WH4872> so <WH3651> did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And there were <WH1961> certain men, <WH376> who <WH834> were <WH1961> defiled <WH2931> by the dead body <WH5315> of a man, <WH120> that they could <WH3201> not <WH3808> keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> on that <WH1931> day: <WH3117> and they came <WH7126> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872> and before <WH6440> Aaron <WH175> on that <WH1931> day: <WH3117>

And those <WH1992> men <WH376> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, We <WH587> are defiled <WH2931> by the dead body <WH5315> of a man: <WH120> wherefore <WH4100> are we kept back, <WH1639> that we may not <WH1115> offer <WH7126> <WH853> an offering <WH7133> of the LORD <WH3068> in his appointed season <WH4150> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel? <WH3478>
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Stand still, <WH5975> and I will hear <WH8085> what <WH4100> the LORD <WH3068> will command <WH6680> concerning you.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> If <WH3588> any man <WH376> <WH376> of you or <WH176> of your posterity <WH1755> shall be <WH1961> unclean <WH2931> by reason of a dead body, <WH5315> or <WH176> be in a journey <WH1870> afar off, <WH7350> yet he shall keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

The fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> at <WH996> even <WH6153> they shall keep <WH6213> it, and eat <WH398> it with <WH5921> unleavened bread <WH4682> and bitter <WH4844> herbs.

They shall leave <WH7604> none <WH3808> of <WH4480> it unto <WH5704> the morning, <WH1242> nor <WH3808> break <WH7665> any bone <WH6106> of it: according to all <WH3605> the ordinances <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453> they shall keep <WH6213> it.

But the man <WH376> that <WH834> is clean, <WH2889> and is <WH1961> not <WH3808> in a journey, <WH1870> and forbeareth <WH2308> to keep <WH6213> the passover, <WH6453> even the same <WH1931> soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from among his people: <WH4480> <WH5971> because <WH3588> he brought <WH7126> not <WH3808> the offering <WH7133> of the LORD <WH3068> in his appointed season, <WH4150> that <WH1931> man <WH376> shall bear <WH5375> his sin. <WH2399>

And if <WH3588> a stranger <WH1616> shall sojourn <WH1481> among <WH854> you, and will keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto the LORD; <WH3068> according to the ordinance <WH2708> of the passover, <WH6453> and according to the manner <WH4941> thereof, so <WH3651> shall he do: <WH6213> ye shall have <WH1961> one <WH259> ordinance, <WH2708> both for the stranger, <WH1616> and for him that was born <WH249> in the land. <WH776>

And on the day <WH3117> that <WH853> the tabernacle <WH4908> was reared up <WH6965> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> <WH853> the tabernacle, <WH4908> namely, the tent <WH168> of the testimony: <WH5715> and at even <WH6153> there was <WH1961> upon <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> as it were the appearance <WH4758> of fire, <WH784> until <WH5704> the morning. <WH1242>
So <WH3651> it was <WH1961> always: <WH8548> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it by day, and the appearance <WH4758> of fire <WH784> by night. <WH3915>

And when <WH6310> the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the tabernacle, <WH168> then after <WH310> that <WH3651> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed: <WH5265> and in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> the cloud <WH6051> abode, <WH7931> there <WH8033> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> pitched their tents. <WH2583>

At <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed, <WH5265> and at <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they pitched: <WH2583> as long as <WH3605> <WH3117> <WH834> the cloud <WH6051> abode <WH7931> upon <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> they rested in their tents. <WH2583>

And when the cloud <WH6051> tarried long <WH748> upon <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> many <WH7227> days, <WH3117> then the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> kept <WH8104> <WH853> the charge <WH4931> of the LORD, <WH3068> and journeyed <WH5265> not. <WH3808>

And so it was, <WH3426> when <WH834> the cloud <WH6051> was <WH1961> a few <WH4557> days <WH3117> upon <WH5921> the tabernacle; <WH4908> according to <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they abode in their tents, <WH2583> and according to <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they journeyed. <WH5265>

And so it was, <WH3426> when <WH834> the cloud <WH6051> abode <WH1961> from even <WH4480> <WH6153> unto <WH5704> the morning, <WH1242> and that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> in the morning, <WH1242> then they journeyed: <WH5265> whether <WH176> it was by day <WH3119> or by night <WH3915> that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up, <WH5927> they journeyed. <WH5265>

Or <WH176> whether it were two days, <WH3117> or <WH176> a month, <WH2320> or <WH176> a year, <WH3117> that the cloud <WH6051> tarried <WH748> upon <WH5921> the tabernacle, <WH4908> remaining <WH7931> thereon, <WH5921> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> abode in their tents, <WH2583> and journeyed <WH5265> not: <WH3808> but when it was taken up, <WH5927> they journeyed. <WH5265>

At <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they rested in the tents, <WH2583> and at <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they journeyed: <WH5265> they kept <WH8104> <WH853> the charge <WH4931> of the LORD, <WH3068> at <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>
